item.title: Hugo Academic Help
item.description: I have summarized often needed but hidden helps for academic template. Deplying the website on github (best help) git clone https://github.com/username/username.github.io cd username.github.io git add –all git commit -m “Initial commit” git push -u origin master The order of appearance of each section (e.g. Projects) on home is controlled by the weight assigned to each section in the index file. Legend list for publication types 0 = Uncategorized 1 = Conference paper 2 = Journal article 3 = Manuscript 4 = Report 5 = Book 6 = Book section
